message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that I believe will be incredibly valuable to your business. While I can't disclose the specifics just yet, I can assure you its worth is significant, exceeding $1000000 to me. I'm confident it will bring substantial benefits to your operations. I'm willing to let you acquire it for $1500000, a price that reflects its potential value. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing this further.
